response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact and elevate your business operations. Our product is designed to streamline processes, enhance efficiency, and provide unparalleled benefits tailored to your specific needs. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000.

We are offering you the chance to secure this game-changing solution at a special introductory price of $995,000. This offer is designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation within your organization. By accepting this proposal, you will not only gain access to cutting-edge technology but also benefit from a comprehensive support package including installation, training, and ongoing maintenance.

Please consider this offer carefully. We understand that decisions of this magnitude require thorough evaluation, and we are more than happy to provide additional information, case studies, or testimonials upon request. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Should you choose to proceed, we look forward to partnering with you on this exciting journey towards achieving new heights in your business endeavors.

Warm regards,
Alice
Product Specialist", "product_price": 995000}
